page.title: 20HOME LIFE IN AMPFIELD
page.content:
{ Mr. Permain works as a builder}in Southampton and starts at 9.00am. He finishes at 6.00pm. His hobby is sport, especially cycling and badminton and goes to them after work. On Saturday mornings the Permains often go shopping and in the afternoon they either go for a walk, to the beach or stay in their garden.On Sundays they sometimes have friends and once a month they go to St.Marks Church which is Church of England. On rainy days they play games and all like to read. Natalie plays with her dolls and practices writing. On sunny days they garden, sunbathe and have friends.Natalie plays in her Wendy House and on her slide and swing.
{Form V, Sherborne House School,1985. }
